types.html:
srol m (uncountable) (slang, regional)

  1. witchcraft, sorcery
    • 2016, “Jewstice”, in Majster, performed by Despo Rutti:
      La pastèque désenvoûte du srol, des piques du Sheytan, pas l’whisky, faut l’assimiler
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
    • 2017, “Jacques a dit”, in Indépendant, performed by Elh Kmer:
      Sors pas les gros gamos
      Car sur toi il feront du srol
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
    • 2017, “Vrai salopard”, in Vigilant, performed by CJ Sordide:
      Coin insalubre, je vois que des cafards
      Où je vie ça pue, du srol comme Jafar
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)

title: srol
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /sʁɔl/
